title: The last champ you played is now your life partner...
body:
**The Adam & Eve Game**.

The last champion you played is now the last being alive on the planet besides yourself and you have to mate in order to repopulate the world. How screwed are you?

{{champion:67}} Condemn me. Tumble with me. ;)

replies.body: {{champion:81}} After all these years, I thought "Gay ez" was just a forced meme from assholes who would never shut up...
{{champion:14}} <_< ... welp, I **was** alive...
{{champion:103}} I regret nothing about last night :D
{{champion:254}} Well shit, this is gonna hurt

Orianna

How the fuck is this gonna work?
Nidalee. I'd probably be killed before anything happened between us. Oh dear.
don't worry though, it's mating season.

Ziggs. 

GG, the last person besides me is a terrorist who excels with long range nukes. And he's responsible for repopulation. LOL.

{{champion:92}} 
hopefully she doesn't break _my_ blade :^)

{{champion:45}} WELP!
How dead am I on a scale on 1-1000?
*looks at Q stacks*
ah I see - 275
R.I.P MarvellousJam 2015

{{champion:90}} : THE VOID HUNGERS
One suppress, a silence,  many voidlings, and a dose of space AIDs later, the world is now repopulated by quickly decaying mass producing void spawn.

{{champion:117}} 
I'm... not sure how I feel about this. I feel like she'll just use me as a plaything with her magic, considering her lore.
{{champion:33}} Okay.

{{champion:22}} hmm. . . .well I was expecting shyvana or leona to be honest, and hoping it wasn't teemo lol!

But I guess this turned out pretty well for me!
{{champion:41}} Well, this is awkward
{{champion:266}} Uhh I don't know about this one.

{{champion:134}} 

I like this thread. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

{{champion:131}} 
Well, we have similar interests, but I honestly think it would never work
{{champion:78}}  ._.

{{champion:254}} I can live with this.

A mechanic and an engineer (in training). What could go wrong?
{{champion:429}} Well.  She probably knows her spear better than I...
{{champion:117}}  I don't know how to handle this.
{{champion:114}}
{{champion:84}} I feel lucky... compared to others. I hope I don't get gashed in the face first...
Gonna be making sweet chocolate love babies with {{champion:245}}  tonight ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
Well. Rek'sai and I aren't going to get along.
